flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I wanted to build a low cost accurate and easy to build CNC machine that could cut parts in a variety of materials.

I don't have an engineering degree, and don't think you should have to to build a simple machine like this.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I wanted to build a low cost accurate and easy to build CNC machine that could cut parts in a variety of materials.

I don't have an engineering degree, and don't think you should have to to build a simple machine like this.
guide.summary: Building a low cost, accurate and easy to build CNC machine.
guide.title: Drawer slide CNC machine
